arabicText: لَن تَنَالُوا۟ ٱلْبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَ ۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِن شَىْءٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
You	can	never	attain	virtue	until you	spend	
in	 Allah's	 cause	 the	 things	 you	 love;	 and	
Allah is	Aware	of	whatever	you	spend.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 hargiz	 bhalāi	 ko	 na	 pahuñcho	 ge	jab	
tak	Rāh-e-Khuda	 me	 apni	 piyāri	 cheez	 na	
kharch	 karo	 aur	 tum	jo	 kuch	 kharch	 karo	
Allah	ko	ma'loom	hai.

arabicText: ۞ كُلُّ ٱلطَّعَامِ كَانَ حِلًّۭا لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ إِلَّا مَا حَرَّمَ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تُنَزَّلَ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةُ ۗ قُلْ فَأْتُوا۟ بِٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ فَٱتْلُوهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
All	food	was	lawful	for	the	Descendants	of	
Israel	(Jacob),	except	what	 Israel	 forbade	
for	himself,	before	the	Taurat	(Torah)	was	
sent	 down;	 say,	 “Bring	 the	 Taurat	 and	
read	it,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Sab	khāne	bani	 Isra’il	ko	halāl	 they	magar	
woh	jo	Y'aqūb ne	apne	upar	harām	kar	liya	
tha	 Taurait utarne	 se	 pahle	 tum	 farmao	
Taurāt lākar	padho	agar	sachhe	ho

arabicText: فَمَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 henceforth	 whoever	 fabricates	 lies	
against	Allah - it	is	they	who	are	the	unjust
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 uske	 bād	 jo	 Allah	 par	 jhoot	 bāñdhe	 to	
wahi	zālim	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ فَٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مِلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًۭا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Allah is	
truthful;	so	follow	the	religion	of	Ibrahim,	
who	 was	 free	 from	 all	 falsehood;	 and	 he	
was	not	of	the	polytheists.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	Allah	sachcha	hai	to	Ibrāheem
ke	deen	par	chalo	jo	har	bātil	se	juda	they	
aur	shirk	wāloñ	meiñ	na	they.

arabicText: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ بَيْتٍۢ وُضِعَ لِلنَّاسِ لَلَّذِى بِبَكَّةَ مُبَارَكًۭا وَهُدًۭى لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	first	house	that	was	appointed	
as	a	 place	 of	worship	 for	mankind,	is	 the	
one	 at	 Mecca	 (the	 Holy	 Ka’aba),	 blessed	
and	a	guidance	to	the	whole	world;
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 sab	 meiñ	 pahla	 ghar	 jo	 logoñ	 ki	
ibādat	 ko	 muqarrar	 huwa	 woh	 hai	 jo	
makkeh	 meiñ	 hai	 barkat	 wāla	 aur	 sāre	
jahāñ	ka	Rahnuma
